sentences.sentence: I was just wondering if you'd found the "Heart of the Ocean" yet.
sentences.translation: 我只是想知道，你们有没有找到“海洋之心”？

sentences.sentence: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
sentences.translation: 未来属于那些相信梦想之美的人。

sentences.sentence: It would be a privilege to have my heart broken by you.
sentences.translation: 能为你心碎是我最大的荣幸。

sentences.sentence: Life is always full of possibilities.
In a world where we obsessively document our own lives, most of us don't pay nearly enough attention to what we owe one another.
sentences.translation: 在这个世界上我们总是过度记录自己的生活，大多数人并不会把我们对彼此的亏欠放在心上。
